title: Is there any way to get in contact with a specific Rioter?
body: I just really wanted to say sorry to a certain Rioter. I played against them in an ARAM game and after that invited them to a draft pick game with some random "recommended" people. During that game the strangers I invited flamed them and I just really wanted wanted to apologize for that. Is there any possible way I could maybe send a message or email to them?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
It's gonna be pretty tough to reach out to someone in particular. I'm sure they understand that person was just having a bad game and hope that person doesn't continue to let their emotions get the best of them.

While I can't help put you in direct contact with them, please let me know if you have any other questions.
Thank you for the reassurance, I've been feeling terrible about that but this makes me feel a lot better.
